abstract: Mario Eggimann (born 24 January 1981 in Brugg, Switzerland) is a Swiss football defender currently playing for 1. FC Union Berlin. He also plays for the Swiss National team.
comment: Mario Eggimann (born 24 January 1981 in Brugg, Switzerland) is a Swiss football defender currently playing for 1. FC Union Berlin. He also plays for the Swiss National team.
